"<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>c975be4b-bbca-42e8-8188-8807ec644ed6#1#2</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">A tételek összefüggésének szemléltetése</string>
            <string language="en">The illustration of the relationship between the theorems</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Abbildung des Verhältnisses zwischen den 
Theoremen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'illustration du rapport entre les théorèmes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A ilustração do relacionamento entre os 
theorems</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'illustrazione del rapporto fra i teoremi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η απεικόνιση της σχέσης μεταξύ των θεωρημάτων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La ilustración del lazo entre los teoremas</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Szemléltető ábra a szinusz- és koszinusztétel közötti öszefüggéshez.</string>
            <string language="en">Demonstrating figure for the relation between the sine and the cosine law</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">11. osztály,  kép,  </string>
            <string language="en">11th form, picture</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Demonstrieren der Abbildung für die Relation 
zwischen dem Sinus und dem Kosinussatz</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Démontrer la figure pour la relation entre le 
sinus et la loi de cosinus</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Demonstrando a figura para a relação entre o 
seno e a lei de cosine</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Dimostrazione della figura per il rapporto fra il
seno e la legge di coseno</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Καταδεικνύοντας αριθμός για τη σχέση μεταξύ του 
ημιτόνου και του νόμου συνημιτόνου</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Demostrar la figura para la relación entre el 
seno y la ley de coseno</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">11. Formular, Abbildung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">11ème forme, image</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">11o formulário, retrato</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">undicesima forma, immagine</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">11η μορφή, εικόνα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">11ma forma, cuadro</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>

            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
